body_html:
I have made many changes according to the previous feedback.

I am still working on designing a new kernel test for the ops based on the recently updated cudnn_rnn_ops_test.py. (I tried the new version of it, but I can't successfully run it in our container. I met many ' 'CudnnGRUSaveable' object has no attribute 'format_converter'' errors)

body:
I have made many changes according to the previous feedback. 

I am still working on designing a new kernel test for the ops based on the recently updated cudnn_rnn_ops_test.py. (I tried the new version of it, but I can't successfully run it in our container. I met many ' 'CudnnGRUSaveable' object has no attribute 'format_converter'' errors)
